attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prime Minister Brown should call a general election. The people of Britain have the democratic right to choose their leader. If he wins then he can focus properly on running the country with a proper mandate derived from the people. If he does not then the British people will have spoken. The Prime Minister argued for a general election when Major took over from Thatcher. Now he must do the right thing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
